name: Prima Marinated Chicken Drumsticks
description:
Prima Treats proudly presents an extravaganza of delicious chicken

delights that is sure to make your life a Treat. You can choose from a

wide range of Sausages, Meat Balls, Marinated Chicken , Crumbed

Chicken and Chicken Slices for great taste and convenience. All Prima

Treats products come in world class packaging, and are made with high

quality Prima Chicken , assuring the highest standards of safety and

hygiene. *Images for illustration purposes only. Product received may vary.
